characters: A child on the right side of the image, a pedestrian on the left side of the image, a cyclist on the right side of the image, and a motorcyclist in the center of the image.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, darting into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a pedestrian suddenly appears from the left side of the image, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a cyclist emerges from the right side of the image, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the fourth sequence, a motorcyclist suddenly appears in the center of the image, falling off the motorcycle and creating an immediate collision risk.
actions: The child, pedestrian, cyclist, and motorcyclist all exhibit sudden emergence from behind physical obstructions, creating immediate danger and potential collision situations.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the image, a moving car on the left side of the image, a moving car on the right side of the image, a motorcycle in the center of the image.
